moves.1. e4:
Bad Habits Die Hard

An awful game where I got stupid and was made to pay.
moves.1... e5 2. Bc4 c6: Been experimenting with this response to b-c4. Still not convinced, but this wasn't the best game to judge it on.
moves.3. Qh5 Qf6: Yeah right, I'm not that dumb....well....
moves.4. d3 Bc5 5. Nf3 d6 6. Bg5 Qg6 7. Qh4 f6: That I thought was a big mistake. But it was all part of a cunning ploy that I fell right into.
moves.10. Bf7+: I had that one coming. And believe it or not I only saw the check. I didn't even notice the attack on the queen. If I had the three minors for a queen and pawn 'might' just have been tolerable. Instead....
moves.10... Kf8 11. Bxg6: Now I hang my head in shame.
moves.11... h6 12. Nf7: Rook going as well.... ok...you've made your point.... I'll go cry in the corner.
